pli-tv-pvr2.13:1.1: Kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyanapaccayā āpattiyo channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.13:1.2: Kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyanapaccayā āpattiyo channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhanti—
pli-tv-pvr2.13:1.3: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato …pe….
pli-tv-pvr2.13:2.1: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā āpattiyo channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.13:2.2: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā āpattiyo channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ catūhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhanti—
pli-tv-pvr2.13:2.3: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhanti, na vācato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr2.13:2.4: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhanti, na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr2.13:2.5: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr2.13:2.6: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti.
